user_stories.title: EPIC: Strategic Alignment OS
user_stories.description: Establishes an adaptive portfolio layer that prioritises workstreams using autonomous scoring and narrative intelligence.
user_stories.i_want: synthesize initiatives against OKRs continuously
user_stories.so_that: AI steering choices stay anchored to outcomes

user_stories.title: EPIC: Autonomous Delivery Coordination
user_stories.description: Coordinates release trains, risk mitigation, and staffing flows with AI copilots that keep execution responsive.
user_stories.i_want: see swarm teams orchestrated without manual triage
user_stories.so_that: critical launches progress even when inputs spike

user_stories.title: EPIC: Insight Co-Pilot Analytics
user_stories.description: Provides evidence-driven dashboards, signal harmonisation, and retrospectives to prove AI PM effectiveness.
user_stories.i_want: trace commitments to quantifiable impacts in real time
user_stories.so_that: stakeholders trust AI derived recommendations

user_stories.title: ALIGN-1.1: Delivery Capacity Signals
user_stories.description: Establishes an adaptive portfolio layer that prioritises workstreams using autonomous scoring and narrative intelligence. Models throughput envelopes using streaming utilisation data and prompts staffing interventions automatically.
user_stories.i_want: forecast when squads will saturate
user_stories.so_that: automation can reroute work before bottlenecks hit

user_stories.title: COORD-2.1: Intake Prioritisation Canvas
user_stories.description: Coordinates release trains, risk mitigation, and staffing flows with AI copilots that keep execution responsive. Creates shared scoring criteria, telemetry hooks, and review cadences that enable confident intake decisions.
user_stories.i_want: rank backlogged requests with transparent scoring
user_stories.so_that: leaders understand why AIPM pivots attention

user_stories.title: ALIGN-1.1.1: Constraint-aware Sequencer
user_stories.description: Establishes an adaptive portfolio layer that prioritises workstreams using autonomous scoring and narrative intelligence. Blends compliance windows with dependency heatmaps to recommend safe landing zones for increments.
user_stories.i_want: stage deliverables around risk windows
user_stories.so_that: high-risk launches earn extra reviews automatically

user_stories.title: ALIGN-1.1.2: Experiment Confidence Monitor
user_stories.description: Establishes an adaptive portfolio layer that prioritises workstreams using autonomous scoring and narrative intelligence. Aggregates cohorts, calculates lift, and alerts when parameters drift beyond tolerances.
user_stories.i_want: know if trials achieve the promised uplift
user_stories.so_that: scale decisions rely on statistically valid evidence

user_stories.title: COORD-2.1.1: Signal Harmonisation Engine
user_stories.description: Coordinates release trains, risk mitigation, and staffing flows with AI copilots that keep execution responsive. Standardises event schemas, deduplicates anomalies, and aligns metadata contracts across ingestion paths.
user_stories.i_want: cleanse noisy signals into trusted indicators
user_stories.so_that: automations trigger only on verifiable patterns

user_stories.title: COORD-1.1.1.2: Cross-team Forecast Sync
user_stories.description: Coordinates release trains, risk mitigation, and staffing flows with AI copilots that keep execution responsive. Aligns velocity projections, scenario planning, and shared risk budgets for connected squads.
user_stories.i_want: merge multiple squad projections
user_stories.so_that: investments remain harmonised across bet types

user_stories.title: COORD-1.1.1.1: Golden Signal Backfill
user_stories.description: Coordinates release trains, risk mitigation, and staffing flows with AI copilots that keep execution responsive. Backfills historical volumes, benchmarks response curves, and calibrates guardrails to updated norms.
user_stories.i_want: replay events to validate alert baselines
user_stories.so_that: auto-remediations stay tuned to new traffic

user_stories.title: ALIGN-1.1.2.1: Golden Signal Backfill
user_stories.description: Establishes an adaptive portfolio layer that prioritises workstreams using autonomous scoring and narrative intelligence. Backfills historical volumes, benchmarks response curves, and calibrates guardrails to updated norms.

user_stories.so_that: auto-remediations stay tuned to new traffic

user_stories.i_want: merge multiple squad projections
user_stories.so_that: investments remain harmonised across bet types

user_stories.title: INSIGHT-1.1.2.1.2.3: Playbook Drift Checker
user_stories.description: Provides evidence-driven dashboards, signal harmonisation, and retrospectives to prove AI PM effectiveness. Compares recorded incident actions with living playbooks and flags deviations for author review.
user_stories.i_want: audit remediation steps stay current
user_stories.so_that: swarm teams avoid repeating stale fixes

acceptance_tests.given: ["Given EPIC: Strategic Alignment OS telemetry for WorkModel, Review_Governance is captured in the evidence lake","And the review cadence for strategic alignment os is configured at 30 minute intervals"]
acceptance_tests.when_step: ["When the autonomous routines execute scenario 1 for EPIC: Strategic Alignment OS","And observers watch deployment metrics for a 90-minute window"]
acceptance_tests.then_step: ["Then the median response stays under 1720 ms with p95 under 2064 ms","And the validation summary at /evidence/align/1/scenario-1.json lists at least 4 events with zero Sev-1 regressions"]
